newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi Arabia beheads Saudi man for murder.
newsitem.headline: Saudi Arabia beheads Saudi man for murder.

text.p: Saudi Arabia beheaded a Saudi man on Wednesday for murder, bringing the number of people executed in the conservative kingdom this year to 43.
An interior ministry statement read on Saudi television said the man was executed in the southwestern Asir province for murdering his uncle.
Saudi Arabia strictly enforces Islamic sharia law by beheading convicted murders, drug smugglers, rapists and other criminals.
